message_1: Given a message with the ASCII encoding "hello", compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message.
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash value of the message "hello", we can use a programming language or an online tool. I'll provide a Python solution here:

```python
import hashlib

message = "hello"
hash_object = hashlib.sha256(message.encode())
hash_value = hash_object.hexdigest()

print(hash_value)
```

Running this code, we get the SHA-256 hash value for the message "hello":

`2cf24dba5fb0a30e26e83b2ac5b9e29e1b161e5c1fa7425e73043362938b9824`
